string.name: cat_snackbar_title
string.description: The title of the snackbar catalog demo. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_description
string.description: The description of the snackbar catalog demo. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: Snackbars show short updates about app processes at the bottom of the screen

string.name: cat_snackbar_default_button
string.description: The label of the button that launches a default snackbar. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_default_message
string.description: The message of the default snackbar. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_single_line_button
string.description: The label of the button that launches a single-line snackbar. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_single_line_message
string.description: The message of the single-line snackbar. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: This is a single-line snackbar that has a long message that should be ellispized.

string.name: cat_snackbar_with_action_button
string.description: The label of the button that launches a snackbar with an action. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_with_action_message
string.description: The message of the snackbar with an action. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_action_title
string.description: The label of the action button inside the snackbar. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_multi_line_button
string.description: The label of the button that launches a multi-line snackbar. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_multi_line_message
string.description: The message of the multi-line snackbar. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: This is a multi-line snackbar that has a long message which should wrap onto more than one line inside the snackbar.

string.name: cat_snackbar_custom_shape_button
string.description: The label of the button that launches a snackbar with a custom background shape. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_snackbar_custom_shape_message
string.description: The message of the snackbar with a custom background shape. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: This is a snackbar with a custom shape
